
A simple ASN.1 parser without any third party dependencies. Requires Java 8
since due to `java.util.Base64` usage.

Every tag has its own multimethod implementation so the parser might be extended
with ease.

The Clojure structures follow the XML-friendly formation to make it easier to
dump the content into an XML file.

## Parsing an RSA key

```bash
lein run key-rsa.pem
```

gives:

```clojure
[{:tag :seq,
  :attr {},
  :content
  [{:tag :int, :attr {}, :content 0}
   {:tag :int,
    :attr {},
    :content
    }
   {:tag :int, :attr {}, :content 65537}
   {:tag :int,
    :attr {},
    :content
    }
   {:tag :int,
    :attr {},
    :content
    }
   {:tag :int,
    :attr {},
    :content
    }
   {:tag :int,
    :attr {},
    :content
    }
   {:tag :int,
    :attr {},
    :content
    }
   {:tag :int,
    :attr {},
    :content
    }]}]
```

## Parsing an EC key

```bash
lein run key-ec.pem
```

gives:


```clojure
[{:tag :seq,
  :attr {},
  :content
  [{:tag :int, :attr {}, :content 1}
   {:tag :octet-string,
    :attr {},
    :content
    "7ABCAAF370A2A53D6D341358F215ABFF2714974D085E0D64E5229150854F9795F13C2D802A3F0ACDCA7E27278F9BE2E8B612A68B72D86336257B8EF0322E53F0A0"}
   {:tag :seq,
    :attr {},
    :content
    [{:tag "NOT IMPLEMENTED: 0x06",
      :attr {},
      :content (43 129 4 0 35)}]}
   {:tag :seq,
    :attr {},
    :content
    [{:tag :bit-string,
      :attr {},
      :content
      ""}]}]}]
```

## Another EC example

```bash
lein run key-ec2.pem
```

produces:

```clojure
[{:tag :seq,
  :attr {},
  :content
  [{:tag :int, :attr {}, :content 1}
   {:tag :octet-string,
    :attr {},
    :content "77CCA1684F3DF45687DECC3C683E05FEFB6931504B7D5AA6"}
   {:tag :seq,
    :attr {},
    :content
    [{:tag :seq,
      :attr {},
      :content
      [{:tag :int, :attr {}, :content 1}
       {:tag :seq,
        :attr {},
        :content
        [{:tag "NOT IMPLEMENTED: 0x06",
          :attr {},
          :content (42 134 72 206 61 1 1)}
         {:tag :int,
          :attr {},
          :content
          6277101735386680763835789423207666416083908700390324961279}]}
       {:tag :seq,
        :attr {},
        :content
        [{:tag :octet-string,
          :attr {},
          :content "FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFEFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFC"}
         {:tag :octet-string,
          :attr {},
          :content "22123DC2395A05CAA7423DAECCC94760A7D462256BD56916"}
         {:tag :bit-string,
          :attr {},
          :content
          "000000001100010001101001011010000100010000110101110111101011001101111000110001001011011001011100101010010101100100011110001010100101011101100011000001011001101000101110"}]}
       {:tag :octet-string,
        :attr {},
        :content
        "047D29778100C65A1DA1783716588DCE2B8B4AEE8E228F189638A90F22637337334B49DCB66A6DC8F9978ACA7648A943B0"}
       {:tag :int,
        :attr {},
        :content
        6277101735386680763835789423166314882687165660350679936019}
       {:tag :int, :attr {}, :content 1}]}]}
   {:tag :seq,
    :attr {},
    :content
    [{:tag :bit-string,
      :attr {},
      :content
      ""}]}]}]
```
